provisions.title: Article 1 - Ratification
provisions.content: The Financing Agreement between the Republic of Rwanda and the International Development Association (IDA), relating to the credit of eight billion, eighty million, two hundred thousand Japanese Yen (JPY 8,080,200,000) and to the grant of fifty-four million, six hundred thousand Special Drawing Rights (SDR 54,600,000) for Energy Access and Quality Improvement Project, signed at Kigali, Rwanda, on 24 September 2020, annexed to this Order is ratified and becomes fully effective.

provisions.title: Article 2 - Authorities responsible for the
provisions.content: implementation of this Order The Prime Minister, the Minister of Finance and Economic Planning, the Minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation and the Minister of Infrastructure are entrusted with the implementation of this Order.

provisions.title: Article 3 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Order comes into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda.
